versions.connectivity: Expansion slot, ROM cartridge socket, dual RS-232 ports, proprietary QLAN local area network ports, dual joystick ports, external Microdrive bus
versions.memory: 128 KB of RAM, expandable to 896 KB
versions.name: Sinclair QL
versions.summary: The Sinclair QL (for Quantum Leap) is a personal computer that was an upper-end counterpart to the ZX Spectrum, and it was based on the Motorola 68008 processor.
